meanings.definition: work paid on an hourly basis
meanings.sent1: I prefer hourlies because I get paid for each hour I work.
meanings.sent2: She filled out her hourlies to make sure she was paid correctly.
meanings.sent3: The hourlies showed how much time everyone spent working.
meanings.sent4: The hourlies were like a map of our productivity throughout the week.
meanings.sent5: His hourlies were neatly organized, showing his dedication to his job.

meanings.definition: a report or record of hours worked
meanings.sent1: The manager reviewed the hourlies to track employee attendance.
meanings.sent2: Please submit your hourlies by the end of the week.
meanings.sent3: The hourlies revealed that some employees were working overtime.
meanings.sent4: Her hourlies were so detailed, they could be used as a reference.
meanings.sent5: The hourlies were missing, causing a delay in processing payroll.

meanings.sent1: The hourlies alarm reminded us of the passing time every hour.
meanings.sent2: The hourlies chime signaled the start of each new hour.
meanings.sent3: The hourlies rain was a constant drizzle throughout the day.
meanings.sent4: The hourlies traffic on the road made the commute slower.
meanings.sent5: The hourlies updates kept us informed about the changing weather.
